whoami¶

Shows the username name of the current user credentials. FORM

fish whoami

EXAMPLES

$ fish whoami

$ fish su greek
Credentials set to user Νικολας (file greek).

$ fish whoami
Νικολας

Previous topic

su

Next topic

help
